Set.Text: The Ziggurat is a Babylonian unique building that increases the [ICON_PEACE] Faith in the city. Unlike the Temple it replaces, the Ziggurat also yields [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and increases the rate of [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Person generation by 15% in this City. City must already have a Shrine.
Increases the [ICON_PEACE] Faith and [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production of a city. Increases rate of [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Person generation by 15% in this City. Only Babylon may build it.
